Attention and Affect Lab

Melanni

PhD Student

Email

Melanni is a psychologist and received her master’s degree in Neurobiology from Universidad Nacional Autonoma de Mexico. She is also a Ph.D. student at Graduate Training Center of Neuroscience, Max Plank research school, Tübingen. Her thesis focuses on the psychological and physiological markers of emotion processing in naturalistic paradigms using a multimodal approach including fMRI, pupillometry and heart rate.
